website_summaries.verdict: The colorful SagaPlay’s safety-tested design, a water resistant frame, and uncomplicated balance based controls make this moderately priced self-balancing personal transporter well-worth your consideration.
pros: Can travel 9 miles in a single charge
Strong dual motors easily handle inclines
Available in black, rose gold, and white
cons: 9 miles is a pretty good distance for a self-balancing personal transporter, but you won’t get more than an hour of travel time per charge

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: The hoverboard gives a smooth ride and has lots of power. It is durable and less heavy than the other brand we have. The only thing we don't like is the loud beeping noise--especially when riding at the park, the ground is less smooth and the hoverboard will beep loudly often. Please make this product with low volume of beeping sound... We really like the functionality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: B F

customer_reviews.title: This scooter sudden off the power
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few years I've tried different brands of self-balancing scooter. (E.g. Kiwano) When received your self-balancing scooter, I fully charged the battery after open box. I went to the park at night. Playing less than 15 minutes, the scooter sudden off the power. I was thrown to the ground, left hand seriously injured, I needed go to the emergency room for medical treatment immediately. Now I still need the medical treatment and cannot go to work
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Was good for a short time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost 6 months ago. At first i was pretty impressed with the overall quality but recently it has developed some issues. It now just beeps and shows red lights when you turn it on or it just tries to take off on its own. Im pretty disappointed that this thing didnt even last 6 months and it was barely even ridden by my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stenger

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy so far
customer_reviews.text: Kids are loving this Hoverboard and it works great outside on grass and pavement.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 13 year old grandson. He loves it!! He had a cheaper model that broke. This one is WAY more sturdy, and the batter life is easily 2x the previous model he had. Highly recommend this model!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan O.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Scooter was didn't work out of the box. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Battery last very long. Kids couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have fun and wear a helmet
customer_reviews.text: We liked it and my granddaughter mastered it in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Langston

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Hoover board for my daughter and seems easy to ride comparing to other brands, fast too, great value in opinion.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Please do not waste your money. Stopped working after a month and a half.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Best Hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the Swagtron Swagboard Twist T881 Lithium-Free and Ul2272 Certified Hoverboard and I returned it the next day because it just would beep, it took forever to charge and the riding time was less than 10 minutes! I bought this SagaPlay instead and it is awesome! It charges in less time and lasts a long time when riding. My fifteen year old loves it. I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: HIGH SPEED, QUALITY, LOTS OF FUN!! OVERALL A GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking.. not too flashy(in my preference). I haven't used it outdoors yet so I'm not sure about the durability and performance on a typical street or road. It gains speed fairly quickly, and rides smooth at fast speeds on even surfaces while battery is fully charged. Going fast at 1/3 battery life shows some restraint(which is normal) when hitting an upward slope so I would recommend keeping the battery charged 2/3 or more if you want a high speed, smooth ride.. Do not go full speed with low battery life, it will throw you forward if you push it and hit a slight incline.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Broken charger
customer_reviews.text: The power adapter broke within a month of using it so it doesn't last long. Without a charger, the unit is useless. Before the charger broke, it ran very well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool gift!! My 13 year old LOVES it. He can listen to music while he rides as well with the Bluetooth feature. It’s pretty fast and beeps when you get going too fast. The only negative is that when the battery wears off it just stops, which can be a little scary if you’re not prepared for it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Stolworthy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Got one for our granddaughter for her birthday. After a few tries we all figured out how to ride it. We all are having so much fun tiding it. Considering purchasing a 2nd one for the adults to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her hoverboard. Sou d system works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My boys 11 & 10 have LOVED these things. They have had hours and hous of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my boys for Christmas!! They love them!! And have been so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Ni

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best gift of the Christmas season! I was a weary because it was on sale, plus Amazon gave a $70 coupon. Net price $55! But my 8 yo grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: stoped staying onafter about a hour
customer_reviews.text: he pluged it in for about 2 hors and then rode it then it just stoped staying on. he reseted it and pluged it in and it still didnt work you should get a jetson strike all terrain thats what i got my doughter and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN walther

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, and we love the fact that it plays music!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wiscombe

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My kids can’t get enough. Thanks so much for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This was great until less than a year of owning it.... it broke. It will not go forward smoothly and makes terrible noises.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Great overboard!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I need to replace the charger though (worked great, just got ran over..), any suggestions on where to find it?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Sagaplay Self Balancing Scooter Hover Self-Balance Board w/ Wireless Speakers - UL2272 Certified, 220W Dual-Motor, 6.5’’ Electric Powered Board Hover [EL-ES11, Black (WT42)]
product_meta.description:
Introducing SagaPlay EL-ES11 Series with Wireless Speaker Self Balance Board Electric Scooter with 6-inch All Terrains Tire

SagaPlay is far from average, it's the next generation of electrical self-balancing board technology. Recently the hoverboard industry took the world by storm as it showed a new innovative form of transportation. Unfortunately this new wave of technology came with a few issues of its own. SagaPlay recognized the problems and safety concerns in the industry and corrected them to develop the transportation of tomorrow for the generation of today. 

The SagaPlay has obtained the highest standard in regards to safety after successfully becoming UL 2272 Certified; assuring users that fire and electrical hazards are not a factor. Besides being safer, SagaPlay stands out because its durable build helps it tackle virtually any obstacle in its way. Travel through grass, mud, dirt and sand with this new device built to go anywhere and do more.
feature_bullets: PLAY SAFE - UL 2272 Certified balance board with UL2271 Certified Smart Battery. Underwent and passed 159 tests regarding safety regulations, meaning no potential fire hazards. Recommended Age 13+.
POWER PLAY – The Sagaplay EL-ES11 has dual 220W motors that help climb slopes as steep as 15 degrees. Travel up to 13 miles on a single charge, traveling up to 10MPH.
PLAY ANYWHERE – Built to be portable, the Sagaplay weighs only 20lbs and can support weight up to 200lbs. Take your Sagaplay when and where you need it for a convenient travel option.
PLAY MUSIC - Sagaplay has a built in (10W) wireless speakers for on-the-go entertainment.
PLAY PROOF - 1 year limited warranty covers parts and labor from the manufacturer, a US company based in Silicon Valley.
